officialTitle: BIOSYM - A Feasibility Randomised Controlled Trial Comparing Biological Matrices With Synthetic Meshes in Women Undergoing One Stage Implant Based Breast Reconstruction
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Female age ≥ 18 Women undergoing mastectomy and immediate one-stage mesh assisted implant breast reconstruction as standard treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

Revision reconstruction surgery Delayed reconstruction surgery
